title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python applications with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration offering Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama supporting multi-model conversations, file uploads, and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for interacting with the Ollama API, supporting streaming and custom options.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama endpoints for Rails apps with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI offering TUI dashboards and bulk model management for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code suggestions via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama providing generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama enabling private and channel-based model queries.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated Modelfile collection for creating custom quantized models optimized for Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama inference across GPU clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store for Q&A.
